name: Overt Ops
description:
The population is brainwashed by Identicorp. Are you bad enough to blow your way to the top?

Overt Ops is a procedurally generated Wolf-like.

It is currently very early in development, and this build is pre-pre-pre-pre-pre-alpha

If you would like to tell us what you think by either providing some user feedback:

https://forms.gle/AHCrqASRTUVw1isL7

or logging a bug:

https://forms.gle/hatvFWhW2mp3iT5RA

it will greatly help in the development of Overt Ops through to becoming a final product.

Thanks and enjoy!
